entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chilliwack
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Agassiz 2:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 5.1°C
Wind: ESE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.summary: Rain. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
